How can the description "an adorable creature" be substituted for the phrase "a cute animal" in the following XML data code snippet?
<pet>
<type>cat</type>
<traits>
<cute>true</cute>
</traits>
</pet>

To substitute the phrase "a cute animal" with "an adorable creature" in the XML data code snippet, you'll need to modify the XML content to reflect the new description. Below is the updated XML snippet:

```xml
<pet>
    <type>cat</type>
    <traits>
        <adorable>true</adorable>
    </traits>
</pet>
```

In this modification, I've changed the `<cute>` tag to `<adorable>` to align with the phrase "an adorable creature."
